title: ACE'S FATHER REVEALED!! One Piece Marineford Episode 459 REACTION + REVIEW

title: One Piece Episode 459 & 460 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Recent reaction covering Episodes 459 and 460, focusing on the revelation of Ace's parentage and the immediate aftermath.

title: Episode 114: The Marineford Mayhem Megacast
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: Comprehensive podcast episode covering the beginning of the Marineford Arc in the anime, including an anime recap for Episode 459. Includes Top 5 scenes they look forward to seeing animated, contest announcements, and discussion of Opening 13 'One day'.

title: One Piece – Marineford Arc (Episodes 457 – 491) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: Comprehensive review of the entire Marineford Arc, including discussion of Episode 459's pivotal revelation about Ace being Roger's son and how it transforms the stakes of the war.

title: 457-459: 'Special Retrospectives' and 'Ticking Down to the Time of Battle'
author: Never Watched One Piece Blog
description: First-time viewer's perspective on Episodes 457-459, discussing the emotional impact of learning about Ace's true parentage and how it recontextualizes everything about his character.
